headings: Want to become a leader in the business world?
Earn a Master’s Degree at the Same Time
What Can You Do With a Management Degree?
Why Earn My Management Degree at Angelo State?
paragraphs: All organizations, whether for-profit, nonprofit or governmental, require managers to guide them into the future. If you can see yourself in that type of leadership position, then earning a business degree in management is a great first step.

In our management program, you’ll learn the skills to thrive in the changing global business environment and prepare for management responsibilities in organizations of any size. In addition to management theory and practices, you’ll learn the communication, time-management and technology skills you need to succeed. You’ll also have opportunities to gain practical experience through our internship program, and to learn more about international business through study abroad.
Contact Information
The Norris-Vincent College of Business is accredited by AACSB International.
You also have the option of applying for our integrated program that allows you to earn your B.B.A. in Management and yourMaster of Business Administration(MBA) degree in as little as five years.

Our faculty bring real-world experience to the classroom, so you get a global view of business and management. You’ll also have the chance to work with them on high-level research projects. You will learn top management skills from real management professionals.
Management Faculty and Staff
ASU Distinguished ScholarshipsOur premier scholarships are awarded based on your academic achievement, and you don’t even have to apply. You are automatically considered once you are admitted to ASU.
General ScholarshipsWe offer over 600 different types of scholarships. You can apply for both our general scholarships and degree-specific scholarships with one application.
Blue and Gold GuaranteeIf you have financial need, you may qualify forfree tuitionto attend Angelo State.

Earning a bachelor’s degree in business management will open career doors for you in many management settings. Our graduates currently hold leadership positions at companies like iMedia Brands, Lexington Realty Trust, TCP Software and other major corporations.

Plus, the U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics reports that employment opportunities for project management specialists, marketing managers, HR managers and medical/health service managers are expected to increase significantly over the next 10 years, adding thousands of high-paying jobs.
Explore Career Possibilities

We offer many opportunities for internships, and we have a dedicated internship coordinator to help you find the right internship to meet your goals. You can also compete in our student BizPitch Contest and/or the San Angelo Business Plan Competition, and you can apply to sharpen your management skills in our Housley Principled Leadership Program. Plus, we have multiple smart classrooms and our own computer lab.

You can join our chapter of the Delta Sigma Pi national professional business fraternity, which has won multiple regional and national awards. You’ll enjoy networking and professional development activities, as well as attending regional and national conferences. You’ll also have access to all the services in ourCenter for Student Successto help you achieve your academic and professional goals.

You can expand your knowledge of management practices in the international marketplace on our annual summer study abroad trip to Europe. You’ll visit cities in nine European countries that host numerous multinational corporations and other international organizations. You’ll also get to visit a variety of historical sites to truly broaden your horizons.

Take your education to the next level in theASU Honors Program. Through special courses, cultural events, research and community engagement, we’ll help you transform your intellectual and personal talents into marketable skills for your future. You’ll also have the opportunity to participate in prestigious internships, fellowships and other programs to reach your full potential.
Explore the Honors Advantage

OurFreshman Collegeis a one-stop resource for programs and services that help you transition into college life, improve your communication skills, and engage in active learning. You can also get academic help in theMath LabandWriting Center, receive peer mentoring and tutoring throughSupplemental Instruction, or set up onlinetutoringsessions.
If you want to go fast, go alone. But if you want to go far, go together.
